content: includes instructions for a crochet pumpkin hat pattern seven sizes to fit everyone in your family > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed - worsted weight yarn exact brand and color provided - crochet hook sizes g & h - tapestry needle for weaving in ends sizes 3 months to adult pattern is written in english using standard american terms level advanced beginner this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer copyright ©2019 crochet 365 knit too do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any way you may however sell finished products due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-pumpkin-hat-in-all-sizes/
